posts.content: Ugh @Japan is so mean. They just captured Manchuria and brutalized the people Nanjing. Tbh Rape, looting, and murder is like totally not okay and like i just don’t understand like why you gotta be like that. *sigh* can you not?
posts.author: Chinese Nationalists

posts.content: Do you hear that sound? It’s the soft melody of PEACE! (insert peace sign) British, French, Italian, and German collaboration at its finest. Pleased at the outcomes of the Munich Conference, and @Hitler has promised to cease German expansion in exchange for the Sudetenlands. We have peace for our time! #brightfuture #AppeasementWorks #PeaceForOurTime
posts.author: Chamberlain

posts.content: We're proud to announce a nonaggression pact with @Germany to foster development of both of our countries. Go future! 🎉
posts.author: USSR is with Germany

posts.content: The effective precision of the Luftwaffe has seen the German invasion of Poland to a successful completion! Our troops have scattered the Polish army in the west, coupled with @SovietUnion’s push from the east. This is the start to a new era. @Poland how does it feel to basically not exist LOL? #unstoppable #beastmode
posts.author: Hitler

posts.content: Oh c'mon Germany, why did you have to invade us? Why couldn't you stp with poland? Calling on our allies to come to our aid, but for right now, At least we're slowing your retreat ;)
posts.author: France

posts.content: It is in moments like these that I truly take pride in our crown, our nation, and our peoples. Over 300,000 of our brave soldiers have been rescued off the beaches of Dunkirk, where they were stranded between the Nazi army and the English Channel in the East of France. #Shoutout to the people of Britain: the merchants, fishermen, and citizens that provided their ships and spearheaded this impressive effort. Citizens of Britain, today is a day of jubilation, but also the turning of a tide. Although @Germany continues air attacks, we will not be shaken but will rather use intelligence, bravery, and our resources effectively to combat this threat.
posts.author: Churchill

posts.content: Proud of my troops today! Our 115 Regiments of 400,000 men went in today to start attacking Japanese transportation infrastructure, and we've made great progress so far
posts.author: General Peng Te-Huai to Mao

posts.content: Our thoughts and prayers are with those who have been affected by, or lost loved ones to bombings on cities and along the coast as a result of The Blitz, a dastardly attempt at invading and threatening our great nation. Although shaken when the first bombings hit the coast, British citizens, member of parliament, and the royal family has continued to carry out their day-to-day lives. We must stand united in the face of this evil, and know that together, we are stronger. @Germany You have not defeated us, and you will not defeat the crown.This so-called Operation has been nothing short of a failure. Long live the Queen!
posts.author: Britain

posts.content: Yaeh, we just made major advances into Egypt with the help of @Rommel. Shout out to my bud Erwin from @Germany for pushing Britain back into Libya!
posts.author: Mussolini

posts.content:
NEVER. TRUST. HITLER. THAT. LYING. SCUM. WHAT HAPPENED TO #BrOsBeFoReHoEs? ILL TELL YOU WHAT

but like for real tho @Hitler that was not cool I cannot believe you have the audacity to bring your bombs, guns, and over three million soldiers into our country. You will pay dearly for the damages that you have caused the great Soviet Union, over 2.5 million people lost, farms, neighborhoods, cities ruined.
posts.author: Stalin

posts.content: @Britain our Leningraders have been suffering and starving because of the German siege. Can you please send help with another front?
posts.author: Stalin

posts.content: Here in America, many of us sympathize with the hardships Britain, France, and their allies are going through. Hence, Congress has decided under my suggestions to make the Lend-Lease Act so the United States can provide materials needed to take down @Axis
posts.author: FDR

posts.content: Sad to mourn the deaths of 2000 people and counting at Pearl Harbor today after Japan surprise-attacked. Good wishes to the families of all those involved after this unprovoked bombing. Will be asking @Congress to enter this war on behalf of the injured families.
posts.author: FDR

posts.content: Japan remains undefeated in our conquest of Southeast Asia! We are victorious and glamorous, and have gained control of the philippines as well. Our captives are getting what they deserve, a grueling 65 mile long march, though few have survived. The enemy is dropping by the dozen, with over 10,000 Filipino soldiers dead and hundred of American ones too!
posts.author: Japan

posts.content:
We have successfully stopped the Italian advances. This is a huge win for us. Thank you @Bernand Montgomery! You have made us proud. 

Yo Hitler! Why did you partner up with the noob Mussolini?
posts.author: Britain

posts.content: With the British and American army invasion completely defeating Italian troops, Italy was in chaos. The public was outraged and took up arms, and @Mussolini is getting the brute of the public’s anger. @Hitler tried to save him but failed miserably, and @Mussolini is finally removed from his throne, and signed an armistice to end the fighting! The Italians rejoice today!
posts.author: Italy

posts.content: We are close to getting the Soviet Union to surrender. The Red Army is such an apt name. They're going down covered in blood. #StalingradSurrounded
posts.author: Hitler

posts.content: A great victory for the Allies today! We have accomplished what we once thought was unattainable. The end of the era of Hitler and @Axis power is in sight! What started with a round of bombings and paratroopers, has come to a fruitful end with over 156,000 Allied troops crossing the English channel, and have finally broke into Europe
posts.author: Allies

posts.content: 🎉 :balloon: Woo! After progressing throughout our country, the wonderful @Allies have finally driven the darn Germans out from Paris itself! Now we can have some macarons o phew
posts.author: de Gaulle

posts.content: We outtie bois!! The Yalta Conference is officially #over. Guess what’s happening to Eastern Europe? @Stalin #slaykween is gaining sm land, but my homie has promised that there’ll be free elections in all of the new lands. The Allies are working together like a dream team machine <3 #staywokeJapan
posts.author: FDR

posts.content: May 8, 1945: We have successfully taken control of Western Germany. Shoutout to @Soviet Union for liberating concentration camps and surrounding Berlin. Yo Hitler, whatcha gonna do now?
posts.author: Britain

posts.content: #BEASTMODE my homie @Douglas MacArthur be out here retaking the Philippines like a mf g. This “island-hopping” campaign is straight fire, with captured islands helping to free others! @Britian mad respect brotha for pushing the Japanese back into the jungles of Burma and Malaya
posts.author: America October 22, 1944

posts.content:
The world has come to a new age with the #UnitedNations #upgrade. The old League of Nations is no more, the old Great Depression is no more, and the old wars are no more!

no more
nom ore
posts.author: United States is with USA, Britain and 3 others

posts.content: Along the lines of yo US just bombed us.
posts.author: Japan

posts.content: At last, the second Great War has come to an end. Bruh it was such a pain. For you guys who are still roaming around Europe--IT’S OVER PEOPLE! Let’s not do this again shall we! #PeaceForever
posts.author: Churchill September 2, 1945
